初.definition: at first; (at the) beginning; first; junior; basic

初一.definition: first day of lunar month; New Year's Day; first year in junior middle school

初三.definition: third year in junior middle school

初中.definition: junior high school (abbr. for 初級中學|初级中学[chu1ji2 zhong1xue2])

初二.definition: 2nd year in junior middle school; 2nd day of a lunar month; 2nd day of lunar New Year

初伏.definition: the first of the three annual periods of hot weather (三伏[san1 fu2]), which typically begins in mid-July and lasts 10 days

初來乍到.definition: to be a newcomer; just off the boat

初出茅廬.definition: venturing from one's thatched hut for the first time (idiom); young and inexperienced; novice; greenhorn

初刻拍案驚奇.pinyin: Chu1 ke4 Pai1 an4 Jing1 qi2
初刻拍案驚奇.definition: Slapping the Table in Amazement (Part I), first of two books of vernacular stories by Ming dynasty novelist Ling Mengchu 凌濛初|凌蒙初[Ling2 Meng2 chu1]

初唐四傑.definition: the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang, namely Wang Bo 王勃[Wang2 Bo2], Yang Jiong 楊炯|杨炯[Yang2 Jiong3], Lu Zhaolin 盧照鄰|卢照邻[Lu2 Zhao4 lin2], and Luo Binwang 駱賓王|骆宾王[Luo4 Bin1 wang2]

初夜.definition: early evening; wedding night; (fig.) first sexual encounter

初婚.definition: to marry for the first time; to be newly married

初小.definition: lower elementary school (abbr. for 初級小學|初级小学[chu1 ji2 xiao3 xue2])

初心.definition: (one's) original intention, aspiration etc; (Buddhism) "beginner's mind" (i.e. having an attitude of openness when studying a subject just as a beginner in that subject would)

初探.definition: to conduct an exploratory foray into (an area of study, a market etc); a preliminary study

初文.definition: archaic (and simpler) form of a Chinese character

初更.definition: first of the five night watch periods 19:00-21:00 (old)

初次.definition: for the first time; first (meeting, attempt etc)

初生之犢不怕虎.pinyin: chu1 sheng1 zhi1 du2 bu4 pa4 hu3
初生之犢不怕虎.definition: see 初生之犢不畏虎|初生之犊不畏虎[chu1 sheng1 zhi1 du2 bu4 wei4 hu3]

初生之犢不畏虎.pinyin: chu1 sheng1 zhi1 du2 bu4 wei4 hu3
初生之犢不畏虎.definition: lit. a new-born calf has no fear of the tiger (idiom); fig. the fearlessness of youth

初生牛犢不怕虎.pinyin: chu1 sheng1 niu2 du2 bu4 pa4 hu3
初生牛犢不怕虎.definition: lit. newborn calves do not fear tigers (idiom); fig. the young are fearless

初秋.definition: early autumn; 7th month of the lunar calendar

初級中學.definition: junior high school; junior middle school

初級小學.definition: lower elementary school (abbr. to 初小[chu1 xiao3])

初聲.definition: the initial consonant (or doubled consonant) of a Korean syllable

初葉.definition: early part (of a decade, century etc); the first years

初試.definition: preliminary exam; qualifying exam; first try; preliminary testing

初試身手.definition: to have a try; to try one's hand; initial foray

初賽.definition: preliminary contest; initial heats of a competition

初露才華.definition: first sign of budding talent; to display one's ability for the first time

初露鋒芒.definition: first sign of budding talent; to display one's ability for the first time

初露頭角.definition: lit. to first show one's horns (idiom); fig. a first show of emerging talent; first sign of emerging talent; budding genius
